team.name: Pulith Rajanayake
team.bio: Pulith leads Kuppi team with a passion for transforming education through AI. Skilled in both frontend and backend development, he ensures seamless integration across the platform.

team.name: Sandeepa Gamage
team.bio: Sandeepa crafts intuitive and engaging user interfaces while also diving into backend development to deliver well-rounded digital experiences.

team.name: Sandev Hettiarachchi
team.bio: Sandev leads development in both frontend and backend, ensuring robust functionality and smooth user interactions.

team.name: Sandaru Malshan
team.bio: Sandaru specializes in backend systems but often steps into frontend development to create cohesive and responsive applications.

team.name: Semal Yapa
team.bio: Semal oversees backend development while collaborating on frontend design, ensuring both functionality and user experience go hand in hand.

team.name: Reshan Silva
team.bio: Reshan focuses on building user-friendly interfaces but also contributes to backend development, bridging the gap between design and functionality.
